sentences.en: a bike's inner tube
sentences.cn: 自行车内胎

sentences.en: a tube of glue
sentences.cn: 一管胶水

sentences.en: a tube of toothpaste
sentences.cn: 一管牙膏

sentences.en: a tube station
sentences.cn: 地铁站

sentences.en: He prefers travelling on the Tube to riding in a limousine.
sentences.cn: 他更愿意乘地铁出行，不愿坐豪华轿车。

sentences.en: He travelled by tube.
sentences.cn: 他乘地铁旅行。

sentences.en: Heat the glass tube to the point that it can bend.
sentences.cn: 将玻璃管加热,以能弯曲为度.

sentences.en: I took the tube then the train and came straight here.
sentences.cn: 我先乘地铁，然后坐火车直奔这里。

sentences.en: I work in the extruded tube business.
sentences.cn: 我做挤压管生意。

sentences.en: pasta tubes
sentences.cn: 通心粉

sentences.en: saw all her plans go down the tubes.
sentences.cn: 看到她所有的计划付之东流

sentences.en: test tube
sentences.cn: 试管

sentences.en: That's Warwick Road, just opposite Earls Court tube station.
sentences.cn: 那是沃里克路，就在伯爵宫地铁站对面。

sentences.en: the bronchial tubes
sentences.cn: 支气管

sentences.en: the country is going slowly and surely down the tubes.
sentences.cn: 这个国家正缓慢而不可挽回地走向绝境。

sentences.en: The doctor introduced a tube into the sick man's wound.
sentences.cn: 医生把一根导管插入病人的伤口.

sentences.en: The fore end tube plate of the condenser has cracked beyond repair.
sentences.cn: 冷凝器前端破裂得无法修理了.

sentences.en: The only baseball he saw was on the tube.
sentences.cn: 他看过的唯一一场棒球赛是在电视上看的。

sentences.en: The secondary current sets up a magnetic field inside the tube.
sentences.cn: 二次电流在管子内部会产生磁场。

sentences.en: The tube is ten feet wide in the clear.
sentences.cn: 这管子内径宽十英尺.

sentences.en: to squeeze a tube of toothpaste
sentences.cn: 挤牙膏

sentences.en: You may get to the railway station by tube.
sentences.cn: 你可以乘地铁到火车站.

words.tran_cn: 把…装管；使成管状（tube的现在分词）

phrases.phrase: down the tubes 或 down the tube &I{【俚语】}

trans.tran_cn: 管子，管状物/容器/器官，地铁，电视机
trans.tran_en: the system of trains that run under the ground in London

trans.tran_cn: 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送
